蹲.definition: to crouch; to squat; to stay (somewhere)

蹲伏.definition: to crouch low and bend forward (esp. in hiding or in wait)

蹲坑.definition: Turkish toilet; squat toilet; to vacate one's bowels

蹲守.definition: to hang around keeping a watch out for sth

蹲膘.definition: to fatten cattle in a shed; to become fat

蹲點.definition: (of a cadre etc) to work for a period of time with a grassroots unit to gain firsthand experience; (dialect) taking a crap
